ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Making platinum?
ygData.msgSnippet: At your level, farm grikbar fur and teeth in Steamfont. It s not super cash, but at your level it s respectable enough. With halfway decent cha the fur goes
ygData.messageBody:
At your level, farm grikbar fur and teeth in Steamfont. It's not super cash,
but at your level it's respectable enough. With halfway decent cha the fur
goes for nearly 1 PP a tuft, and the teeth for about 1/3 a PP. I managed to
get 25 PP from lvl 5 to 8 with my froggie warrior here without even trying.
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Talbot <chris@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 01, 2003 12:53 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Making platinum?


> Hi, everyone.
>
> I've only been playing EQ a few months, and I have a ranger on Tarew Marr
> who has just made 12th level and a warrior who's at 3rd level. I keep
> looking for strategies for each character all over the Web, but one thing
> eludes me. Of course, that's making platinum. I keep seeing all these
books
> for sale on how to make platinum easily and quickly, but I keep writing
them
> off as scams. Are there any half-decent methods for growing wealthier?
>
> Chris
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
>
